data.name: Text
data.text: NuMed Systems Private limited an ISO 13485-2015 organisation, A Leading Radio Frequency Shielding manufacturer, Vendor for Medical equipment Installations for Major OEMs and a Solution provider for Equipment planning and turnkey solutions, practices vendor-neutral business principles follow NDA (Non-disclosure agreement) with its clients ensures utmost confidentiality of client data and technology.NuMed Systems Established in 2015 as proprietorship later re-launched as private limited in 2018. Over these year NuMed could establish as a most reliable vendor and a solution provider to many major OEMs and clients.
